column13: The Fourth Noble Truth of the Path to the Cessation of Suffering is equivalent to the Noble Eightfold Path below.
column14: The Fourth Noble Truth of the Path to the Cessation of Suffering is equivalent to the [Noble Eightfold Path](topic:path).

column11: Two short excerpts; looking for excerpt relating to 4NT.

column12: [Discernment](tag:) (pañña) includes correct perception and skillful choices at any level of refinement. [Investigation of states](tag:) (dhamma-vicaya) refers specifically to identifying skillful and unskillful states of mind in the early stages of meditation. [Appropriate attention](tag:) (yoniso manasikāra) refers to acts of discernment related to the field of attention.

column13: [Ignorance](cluster:), [Craving](cluster:), [Clinging](cluster:), and [Becoming](cluster:) appear in Dependent Origination below.
